dict.acceptation: 传统的；习用的，平常的；依照惯例的；约定的；

sent.orig: Menggulin oilfield is composed of conventional oil sand reservoirs and conventional oil bottom water conglomerate reservoirs.
sent.trans: 蒙古林油田由普通稠油砂岩油藏和普通稠油砾岩底水油藏组成，油层单一，油水粘度比大，层间接替能力差、稳产难度大。

sent.orig: The energy conservation equations in conventional inertial system and conventional terrestrial system are introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了惯性系和地固系下的能量守恒方程。

sent.orig: Conventional warfare is conducted by using conventional military weapons instead of nuclear weapons.
sent.trans: 常规战争使用的是用常规武器而不是核武器。

sent.orig: Therefore, development prospect of conventional fire-retardant fibers, fire retardant and fire proofing methods are forecasted reasonably.
sent.trans: 并合理预测了常规阻燃纤维、阻燃剂和织物阻燃整理方法的发展趋势。

sent.orig: The time of recovery after fault clearance is longer than conventional HVDC.
sent.trans: 表现在交流系统故障清除后系统重新进入稳态时间过长，以致换相失败。
